```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
mental <- read_csv("data/mentalhealth.csv")
names(mental) <- gsub(" ", "_", names(mental)) |> tolower()
```

```{r}
mental|>
    filter(group == "By Sex") |>
    group_by(time_period, subgroup) |>
    summarize(average = mean(value, na.rm = TRUE)) |>
    ggplot(aes(x = time_period, y = average)) +
    geom_line(aes(col = subgroup))

mod_ex <- 
  lm(
    data = mental|>
      filter(group == "By Sex"),
   value ~ time_period + subgroup)

summary(mod_ex)$coefficients |> knitr::kable(digits = 3)
```
